job_description: Analyze data sets and develop predictive models.

selection_procedure.telephonic_interview: Technical background discussion and project review
selection_procedure.technical_round: Present a case study and discuss findings
selection_procedure.HR_round: Evaluate interpersonal skills and cultural fit

job_description: Assist in developing and implementing marketing strategies.

selection_procedure.written_test: Analyze marketing scenarios and propose solutions
selection_procedure.group_discussion: Collaborate with peers on marketing challenges
selection_procedure.HR_round: Evaluate communication skills and cultural fit

job_description: Create visual concepts and designs for various projects.

selection_procedure.portfolio_review: Evaluate design portfolio and previous projects
selection_procedure.design_challenge: Complete a design task under time constraints
selection_procedure.technical_interview: Discuss design principles and software proficiency
selection_procedure.HR_round: Evaluate personality traits and cultural fit

job_description: Assist in recruitment, training, and employee relations.

selection_procedure.role_play: Simulate HR scenarios and assess problem-solving skills
selection_procedure.behavioral_interview: Evaluate interpersonal skills and cultural fit
selection_procedure.HR_round: Final assessment of suitability for the role

job_description: Assist in product development and testing.

selection_procedure.telephonic_interview: Discuss technical skills and academic background
selection_procedure.technical_challenge: Solve engineering problems related to the field
selection_procedure.coding_round: Implement algorithms and solve coding challenges
selection_procedure.HR_round: Evaluate communication skills and cultural fit
